root.name: Rad Raygun
root.description: OverviewRad Raygun is an action platformer game developed and published by TRU FUN Entertainment for the Xbox 360 and PC platforms.GameplayRad Raygun is a 2-D sidescrolling action platforming game similar to the 8-bit Mega Man games. The game contains five different levels, each ending with a boss fight. Throughout the early part of the game players will acquire some new abilities such as sliding and dashing. The game also contains various power ups which will upgrade weapon damage and decrease the amount of damage taken from enemies.Visual StyleThe game has a visual style which is supposed to mimic that of the original Game Boy with the different shades of green.SoundtrackThe soundtrack for Rad Raygun was composed by Swedish musician FantomenK.
